TITLE: Coming!!
ABOUT: Introducing the world's worst soldier... Private Snafu.

TITLE: Rumors
ABOUT: Private Snafu passes along a latrine-o-gram.

TITLE: Fighting Tools
ABOUT: Private Snafu suffers the consequences of not keeping his equipment and weapons properly maintained.

TITLE: Gripes
ABOUT: Private Snafu learns the hard way about the need for military dicipline and procedures to maintain an effective army.

TITLE: The Goldbrick
ABOUT: Private Snafu's laziness aids the enemy.

TITLE: The Infantry Blues
ABOUT: Private Snafu complains about being assigned to the infantry only to learn that other branches have their own problems.

TITLE: The Home Front
ABOUT: Private Snafu imagines the good times his family is having back home while he's stationed in the Arctic.

TITLE: Spies
ABOUT: Private Snafu has a secret: his ship leaves for Africa at 4:30

TITLE: A Few Quick Facts: Inflation
ABOUT: Private Snafu learns why his pay doesn't go quite as far.

TITLE: Censored!
ABOUT: Private Snafu worms his way around the postal censor.

TITLE: Gas
ABOUT: Private Snafu needs his gas mask.

TITLE: Booby traps
ABOUT: Private Snafu learns about the hazards of enemy booby traps the hard way.

TITLE: Payday
ABOUT: Private Snafu spends all his pay on booze and whores.

TITLE: Going Home
ABOUT: Private Snafu can't keep his stupid trap shut.

TITLE: Outpost
ABOUT: Private Snafu is stationed on a remote island.

TITLE: The Chow Hound
ABOUT: Private Snafu learns about good nutrition.

TITLE: Snafuperman
ABOUT: Private Snafu mocks his peers who study.

TITLE: Target Snafu
ABOUT: Private Snafu versus pestilent mosquitoes.

TITLE: Three Brothers
ABOUT: We meet the 2 brothers of Private Snafu - a pigeon keeper named Tarfu & a dog trainer named Fubar.

TITLE: A Few Quick Facts: Fear
ABOUT: Private Snafu learns about the corporeal effects of fear.

TITLE: Hot Spot
ABOUT: In Iran a Harold Peary-sounding Satan warns Private Snafu about the hazards of working in the heat.

TITLE: In the Aleutians
ABOUT: The Aleutian Islands and their strategic value.

TITLE: It's Murder She Says
ABOUT: A mosquito complains about life when soldiers protect against malaria.

TITLE: No Buddy Atoll
ABOUT: Private Snafu and a Japanese sailor simultaneously land on a deserted island.

TITLE: Operation Snafu
ABOUT: Private Snafu undertakes a clandestine operation in Axis Japan.

TITLE: Seaman Tarfu in the Navy
ABOUT: Private Snafu introduces his Seaman brother Tarfu
